add.title: Written Commitment
add.description: A signed letter stating you will leave Switzerland after completing your studies.

steps_flow.title: University Admission
steps_flow.description: Apply and receive the acceptance letter from a Swiss university.

steps_flow.title: Book Appointment
steps_flow.description: Book a National Visa appointment at VFS Global.

steps_flow.title: Submit Application
steps_flow.description: Submit documents. The Consulate forwards them to the Cantonal Migration Office.

steps_flow.title: Cantonal Approval
steps_flow.description: Wait for the Canton to authorize the visa (can take 8-10 weeks).

application_platforms.name: University Portals
application_platforms.description: Applications are submitted directly to each university's online portal.

required_exams: GRE (Required for some Master's at ETH/EPFL)

pre_visa_steps.title: Check Requirements
pre_visa_steps.description: Verify specific requirements for ETH/EPFL or other unis.

pre_visa_steps.title: Apply Online
pre_visa_steps.description: Submit application and pay the fee (approx. 100-150 CHF).

pre_visa_steps.title: Proof of Funds
pre_visa_steps.description: Ensure you have approx. 21,000 CHF in a bank account for the first year.
